content.prompt: Which of the following pieces of evidence could best be used to support the argument made in the excerpt?

choices.label: The United States government eliminated segregation in defense industry work and in the armed forces.
The United States experienced persistent racial violence throughout the early twentieth century.
The United States Congress enacted laws restricting freedom of speech in reaction to the first Red Scare.
The United States placed severe restrictions on immigration from southern and eastern Europe.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
